main event: A witness in Kalida, Ohio reported seeing a low-flying, shiny, round object that was silent and soundless on April 3, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared solid, white, bright, brilliant, and glistening.
The object moved behind and in front of clouds during the sighting.
The witness estimated the object would have been covered about 1/2 to 2/3 by a match held at arm's length.
The witness estimated the object was 1 1/2 to 2 miles away.
The witness reported that many people in the area saw the same or a similar object.
sighted object: a shiny, round, silent, and soundless object
